p.seg: And so the ministers from the older generation in his own family will be earnestly prepared to die for the ancestral temple,
the ministers in charge of the legal system will earnestly ready to die for the Altars of State,
the domestic ministers will be earnestly ready to serve their ruler;
the defense ministers will be earnestly ready to die for the city walls and the borders of the land.
That is why it is said that the sage has golden city walls,
These men are ready to die for one
and as a result one can survive together with them;
they are ready to be ruined for one,
and as a result one can survive together with them.
Now the general being prepared to face danger for one
and as a result one can be safe together with him.
Words and actions embracing the One Unity is called morality.
